roleset.name: send via a specific route
roleset.note: ROUTE-V NOTES: frames created by Olga (from route.01-v)

example.name: route-v: with destination
example.text: The side car routes program trades into a special computer file that [*T*-1] scans for imbalances of buy and sell orders .
example.arg: into a special computer file that [*T*-1] scans for imbalances of buy and sell orders

example.name: route-v: without destination
example.text: While the exchange 's equities floor in San Francisco remained open on a limited basis , orders-1 were being routed and executed [*-1] in Los Angeles .
example.arg: While the exchange 's equities floor in San Francisco remained open on a limited basis

roleset.name: defeat soundly
roleset.note: ROUT-V, ROUTING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: alias-v
example.text: Afterwards, we did beat the North Koreans until ChiComs routed us at the Battle of Turtle's head and the Battle at Camel's head
example.arg: at the Battle of Turtle's head and the Battle at Camel's head

roleset.name: woodwork: use a router
roleset.note: ROUT-V, ROUTING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: route-v
example.text: In addition to enlarging the through-hole, I routed a lip on the underside of the table to allow the leveling screws to reach the underside of the router plate.
example.arg: In addition to enlarging the through-hole
on the underside of the table
to allow the leveling screws to reach the underside of the router plate
